item.title: Percona Live Europe in Dublin
item.description: The MySQL Belgian Users will gather at Percona Live in Dublin on September 25.

item.title: Home
item.description: Welcome to the MySQL and Friends Belgian Users Group! We are a group of passionate MySQL, MariaDB, Percona server, … users and we meet frequently around Belgium. Our meetings are free and we want to highlight the best topics in the database world: performance, innovation, replication… Join us, and follow us to keep in touch!
